-- | vector-space instances for the fixed-point package
--   
--   This package provides instances of VectorSpace, AffineSpace, etc. for
--   the fixed-point package.
@package fixed-point-vector-space
@version 0.5.0.1

module Data.Fixed.Binary.VectorSpace
instance (HasResolution r, Bits a, Bits (Super a), Integral a, Integral (Super a), SuperTypeable a) => InnerSpace (Fixed r a)
instance (HasResolution r, Bits a, Bits (Super a), Integral a, Integral (Super a), SuperTypeable a) => VectorSpace (Fixed r a)
instance (HasResolution r, Bits a, Bits (Super a), Integral a, Integral (Super a), SuperTypeable a) => HasBasis (Fixed r a)
instance (HasResolution r, Bits a, Bits (Super a), Integral a, Integral (Super a), SuperTypeable a) => AffineSpace (Fixed r a)
instance (HasResolution r, Bits a, Bits (Super a), Integral a, Integral (Super a), SuperTypeable a) => AdditiveGroup (Fixed r a)
